content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great value. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking about 500 euros per month. It's a great apartment, but I can only afford that much.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand that you're a student and on a budget, but 500 euros per month is much lower than the market value for this apartment. It's a brand new, centrally located unit with all amenities nearby. The going rate for similar apartments in the city center is around 1200 euros per month. I'm sure you'll agree that this is a fantastic deal for such a prime location. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view and I appreciate the quality of the apartment. However, I am really on a tight budget. How about 750 euros per month? It's a reasonable compromise between my offer and your initial suggestion.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 750 euros per month is still significantly lower than what I believe this apartment is worth, but I'm willing to consider it. Would you be willing to sign a two-year lease if I were to agree to this price? It would provide me with some stability as a landlord.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 750 euros per month, and I am also willing to sign a two-year lease. I think it's a fair compromise, and I am looking forward to renting the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 750 euros per month, and I am also willing to sign a two-year lease. I think it's a fair compromise, and I am looking forward to renting the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
